highestRated.title: Ikitai to Ie! Oretachi wa Nakama Da!!
highestRated.plot: Since she was 8, Robin's life has been a constant struggle to survive. Everybody has told her that her existence was a crime, and now Luffy begs her to stay alive.

lowestRated.title: Shutsudou Chopperman! Mamore Nagisa no TV-kyoku
lowestRated.plot: The adventures of Chopperman the hero and his battle against evil Usodabada.
